column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I've been to Cafe Ba Ba Reeba for years and love my in person experience - such a fun space and amazing food for tapas. My go-to's are the: seafood paella
column7: goat cheese baked in tomato sauce with garlic bread (MUST GET!!)
column8: patatas bravas (crispy potatoes that taste exactly like the ones you get in Spain and the spicy aioli is to die for!!) and any of the sangrias!
